channel.title: Need help with adding custom item stats! (using delta base)
channel.description:
ok, so I've spent so much time adding working d claws, correct models, even a working 4 hit special using dhally animation... but when you equip them they have no attack/defence/strength bonus. Every tutorial i've looked for talks about going into item.cfg and just adding (what would be for me) item = 8002 Dragon_Claws A_set_of_fighting_claws. 1 1 1 1 1 1 <~ (stats) but when I open my Item.Cfg this is what i see: [code]Êþº¾ 2 ë G — F ˜ ™ š F › F œ F  F ž F Ÿ F F ¡ F ¢ F £ F ¤ F ¥ F ¦ F § F ¨ F © F ª F « F ¬BË+J F ­ F ® F ¯ F ° F ± F ² F ³ F ´ F µ F ¶ F · F ¸ F ¹ F º F » F ¼ F ½ F ¾ F ¿ F À F Á F Â F Ã w I F Ä F Å Æ Ç È 3 É 2 Ê 2 Ë 2 Ì Í Î Ï Ð Ñ Ò 9 Ó Ô Õ Ö × Ø Ù Ú Û Ü Ý amulets [I arrows body boots capes crackers fishing_big_net fishing_big_net_lvl fishing_big_net_xp fishing_fly fishing_fly_lvl fishing_fly_xp fishing_harpoon fishing_harpoon_lvl fishing_harpoon_xp fishing_net fishing_net_lvl fishing_net_xp fishing_rod1 fishing_rod1_lvl fishing_rod1_xp fishing_rod2 fishing_rod2_lvl fishing_rod2_xp Helm fullHelm fullMask gloves hats itemIsNote [Z itemSellable itemStackable itemTradeable itemTwoHanded legs normal_gems platebody rings shields Barrows Clue shilo_gems smithing_frame [[[I SmithingItems [[I <init> ()V Code LineNumberTable randomBarrows ()I randomClue isHelm (I)Z StackMapTable isFullHelm isFullMask isPlate randomAmulet randomArrows randomBody randomBoots randomCape randomGloves randomHat randomLegs randomNGems randomPHat randomRing randomSGems randomShield <clinit> Æ Í SourceFile Item.java x y q I Þ ß à r I a I b I c I n I H I J I K I L I M I d I e I l I m I N I o I s I p I O I P I Q I R I S I T I U I V I W I X I Y I Z I [ I \ I ] I ^ I _ I ` I f g h g i g j g k g t u v w java/io/FileInputStream java/io/File data/stackable.dat x á x â ã } ä y java/io/IOException å æ ç 2Critical error while loading stackabledata! Trace: è é á ê y data/notes.dat -Critical error while loading notedata! Trace: data/twohanded.dat .Critical error while loading twohanded! And other such interesting nonsense. all i wanna find is the list of items+stats, help please? EDIT:: I'm using a deltascape source

item.title: Need help with adding custom item stats! (using delta base)
item.dc:creator: @sergiypro sergiypro
item.description:
@sergiypro wrote:

umm how do u add models? i got the correct .dat files and i put them into my models folder and then i added them ingame… it said that the model was added… but when i equip the dclaws… it has the correct stats but the image is white claws…

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with adding custom item stats! (using delta base)

item.title: Need help with adding custom item stats! (using delta base)
item.dc:creator: @tofupuppet tofupuppet
item.description:
@tofupuppet wrote:

[quote=“raped by who, post:2, topic:293316”]That’s item.java.

Config Folder >> Item is in there.[/quote]
wow… ty… tyvm im an idiot soz =P
Problem solved, please close.
